ygData.subject: FINAL JOURNEY
ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron pulled the golden disc out. The instant the disc was pulled it turned black the hologram turned off. All the walls showed thier true selves. Covered

Subject: FINAL JOURNEY
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Megatron pulled the golden disc out. The instant the disc was pulled it 
turned black the hologram turned off. All the walls showed thier true selves. 
Covered with  chemical explosives. The walls had been constructed over the 
last year of hybernation  4 layers of pure titanium.  In between the layers 
on the celing and the floor where the same number of chemical explosives. 
Ready to blow. Unknown to the bots when the door shut behind them two fused 
layers fell behind it. Makeing any escape out the door impossible.There where 
no open vents or hallways to run too. They where all trapped. At the exact 
moment Megatron released the disc the milla second the disc was released from 
the lock and turned black the  base incenerated. A 1 mile wide crater was 
made. A cloud able to be seen for miles around hit the sky. The shock wave 
incenerated anything within 1 miles up in the air down in the earth and 1 
miles each side of where the base exploded. Nothing could survive.




--part1_ad.6a378e4.27b464d3_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
